I, CHIMANLAL VITHALDAS MAPARA, formerly residing at Bombay, India, and currently residing at Feeder Road, B:LIMORA, Gujarat State, India, father of MANOJ CHIMANLAL MAPARA of 775, Fairway Milks Lane, Anaheim Hills, CALIFORNIA 92807, U.S.A., do hereby state on oath and solemnly affirm that I was born on May, 7, 1906 at Kadod Dist: Surat) Gujarat State, India. I solemnly declare and affirm under the penalty of perjury that all the particulars given by me in respect of this affidavit are true and correct in substance and in fact. Signature : Vithaldes Solemnly affirmed by Date : 'so Majuna CHIMANLAL VITHALDAS MAPARA, of BILIMORA, Gujarat State. Witness : India. Identified by shur.M.M I know the deponent SHA HofoBilimna.
